body:
This is very bright and shiny.

I don't see any major problems poking around the site, except that the section(?) around submit buttons looks very much like a text field:

![screenshot-2017-11-20 shield control panel 1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/305049/33041029-cc69635e-cdf1-11e7-8cc2-ef689ad1725b.png)
![screenshot-2017-11-20 shield control panel](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/305049/33041030-cc816be8-cdf1-11e7-8a77-fb3ffcaa8736.png)

I'm  also not a fan of how much the logout button stands out in the new colors. It is much higher contrast and visually heavier than most of the rest of the page. I think this also applies to a lesser extent to the delete branch buttons in the preference experiment arguments editor.
